TopicTitle: Need help solving problems with Gmod

Articles.Content:
My Gmod I recently bought freezes at the title screen, some times for 4 minutes, sometimes forever.

I can post any logs someone might need.

That is normal, the game usually takes a second to load, especially if you have some mods. Now if you haven't installed any mods, but it still takes forever, I am not quite sure what the problem is. :\
There is this thing called Steamforums... KSP forums aren't exactly the place to put this on.
This is the junkyard section, why can't he post it here?
Well, because it isn't just a random topic, it is a support topic
And Steam would actually be more helpful than this as someone else is probably having the same issue.
Try verifying the game cache, that might fix it, if it doesn't, then reinstall the game.
